abstract: Black and Blanco’s crumbly, shortbread-style cookies are inspired by North African treats called ghoribas and are available for purchase online and at several locations in New York City
snippet: Black and Blanco’s crumbly, shortbread-style cookies are inspired by North African treats called ghoribas.
lead_paragraph: Black and Blanco’s crumbly, shortbread-style cookies are inspired by North African treats called ghoribas.

headline.main: Cookies From Casablanca, Now in New York
headline.seo: Moroccan Cookies From Black and Blanco
